(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP You))
    (VP (VBP know)
      (S
        (NP (PRP we))
        (RB all)
        (VP (VB take)
          (NP (NNS chopsticks))
          (PP (IN for)
            (S
              (VP (JJ granted)))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(know-2, You-1)
root(ROOT-0, know-2)
nsubj(take-5, we-3)
advmod(take-5, all-4)
ccomp(know-2, take-5)
dobj(take-5, chopsticks-6)
prep(take-5, for-7)
pcomp(for-7, granted-8)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (PDT such) (DT a) (NN part))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (PRP$ our) (JJ Chinese) (NN culture))))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP we))
          (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
            (ADVP (RB even))
            (VP (VB bother)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB teach)
                    (NP (PRP$ our) (NNS kids))
                    (SBAR
                      (WHADVP (WRB how))
                      (S
                        (VP (TO to)
                          (VP (VB hold)
                            (NP (PRP$ their) (NNS chopsticks))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(part-5, It-1)
cop(part-5, is-2)
predet(part-5, such-3)
det(part-5, a-4)
root(ROOT-0, part-5)
prep(part-5, of-6)
poss(culture-9, our-7)
amod(culture-9, Chinese-8)
pobj(of-6, culture-9)
mark(bother-15, that-10)
nsubj(bother-15, we-11)
aux(bother-15, do-12)
neg(bother-15, n't-13)
advmod(bother-15, even-14)
ccomp(part-5, bother-15)
aux(teach-17, to-16)
xcomp(bother-15, teach-17)
poss(kids-19, our-18)
dobj(teach-17, kids-19)
advmod(hold-22, how-20)
aux(hold-22, to-21)
xcomp(teach-17, hold-22)
poss(chopsticks-24, their-23)
dobj(hold-22, chopsticks-24)


(ROOT
  (SBAR
    (WHADJP (WRB How) (JJ many)
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (PRP you))))
    (S
      (S
        (VP
          (ADVP (RB actually))
          (VB remember)
          (NP (PRP$ your) (NN father))
          (S
            (VP (VBG sitting)
              (NP (PRP you))
              (ADVP (RB down)
                (NP (CD one) (NN day)))))))
      (CC and)
      (S
        (VP (VBG saying)
          (PP (TO to)
            (NP (PRP you))))
        (, ,)))))


advmod(many-2, How-1)
dep(remember-6, many-2)
prep(many-2, of-3)
pobj(of-3, you-4)
advmod(remember-6, actually-5)
root(ROOT-0, remember-6)
poss(father-8, your-7)
dobj(remember-6, father-8)
xcomp(remember-6, sitting-9)
dobj(sitting-9, you-10)
advmod(sitting-9, down-11)
num(day-13, one-12)
pobj(down-11, day-13)
cc(remember-6, and-14)
conj(remember-6, saying-15)
prep(saying-15, to-16)
pobj(to-16, you-17)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN ``)
      (NP (NNP Son)))
    (, ,)))


pobj(``-1, Son-2)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB now))
    (SBAR (IN that)
      (S
        (NP (PRP you))
        (VP (VBP have)
          (VP (VBN come)
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (NN age)))
            (, ,)))))))


root(ROOT-0, now-1)
mark(come-5, that-2)
nsubj(come-5, you-3)
aux(come-5, have-4)
dep(now-1, come-5)
prep(come-5, of-6)
pobj(of-6, age-7)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NN daddy))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (VP (VBG going)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB show)
              (NP (PRP you))
              (SBAR
                (WHADVP (WRB how))
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB hold)
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT a) (NN pair))
                        (PP (IN of)
                          (NP (NNS chopsticks)))
                        ('' '')))))))))))
    (. ?)))


nsubj(going-3, daddy-1)
aux(going-3, is-2)
root(ROOT-0, going-3)
aux(show-5, to-4)
xcomp(going-3, show-5)
dobj(show-5, you-6)
advmod(hold-9, how-7)
aux(hold-9, to-8)
xcomp(show-5, hold-9)
det(pair-11, a-10)
dobj(hold-9, pair-11)
prep(pair-11, of-12)
pobj(of-12, chopsticks-13)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN No))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, No-1)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP
      (ADVP (RBR more) (RB often))
      (IN than)
      (NP (RB not)))
    (, ,)))


advmod(often-2, more-1)
advmod(than-3, often-2)
root(ROOT-0, than-3)
pobj(than-3, not-4)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP we))
    (ADVP (RB all) (RB just))
    (VP
      (VP (VBP pick)
        (PRT (RP up))
        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (NN pair))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP
              (NP (NNS chopsticks))
              (NP (CD one) (NN day))))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBD started)
        (S
          (VP (VBG using)
            (NP (PRP them))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(pick-4, we-1)
advmod(just-3, all-2)
advmod(pick-4, just-3)
root(ROOT-0, pick-4)
prt(pick-4, up-5)
det(pair-7, a-6)
dobj(pick-4, pair-7)
prep(pair-7, of-8)
pobj(of-8, chopsticks-9)
num(day-11, one-10)
dep(chopsticks-9, day-11)
cc(pick-4, and-12)
conj(pick-4, started-13)
xcomp(started-13, using-14)
dobj(using-14, them-15)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Unfortunately))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Unfortunately-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (PP (IN for)
        (NP
          (NP (DT that) (NN reason))
          (PP (IN that)
            (NP
              (NP (DT a) (NN lot))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (NNS people))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(is-2, it-1)
root(ROOT-0, is-2)
prep(is-2, for-3)
det(reason-5, that-4)
pobj(for-3, reason-5)
prep(reason-5, that-6)
det(lot-8, a-7)
pobj(that-6, lot-8)
prep(lot-8, of-9)
pobj(of-9, people-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP myself))
    (VP (VBD included))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(included-2, myself-1)
root(ROOT-0, included-2)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VBN ended)
      (PRT (RP up))
      (NP
        (NP (VBG holding) (NNS chopsticks))
        (VP (VBN crossed)
          (PP (IN like)
            (ADVP
              (NP (DT the) (NN photo))
              (IN above))))))
    (. !)))


root(ROOT-0, ended-1)
prt(ended-1, up-2)
amod(chopsticks-4, holding-3)
dobj(ended-1, chopsticks-4)
partmod(chopsticks-4, crossed-5)
prep(crossed-5, like-6)
det(photo-8, the-7)
npadvmod(above-9, photo-8)
pcomp(like-6, above-9)
